name: Pixel of Memory
description:
Waking up disoriented, confused, and detached from his usual senses, a person with the identification number “404” finds himself at the old treehouse that isn’t supposed to be there anymore. There are only two things left in his cloudy mind: a desire to paint and a mysterious attachment to this place with every single trivial object in it.



✨ Key Features ✨
🖍 Relaxing retro pixel puzzles
🖍 A heartfelt story of self-discovery and hope
🖍 Nostalgic environment and music


          Place the missing pieces into their designated spots and fill the void of one’s soul
